SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package com.floweektracker.repository

Class TaskNamesRepository

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.repository.TaskNamesRepository
public class TaskNamesRepository extends Object
Represents the repository of the task names. Repository is a singleton with no args constructor. This class supports saving and loading operations from a file in json format.

Fields: repository, taskNames, file, gson

Methods: saveTaskNames() ()}, loadTaskNames() ()}}

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskNamesRepository

      public TaskNamesRepository()

  • Method Details

    • saveTaskNames

      public boolean saveTaskNames()
      Save user-entered data from taskNames to the file. May throw an NullPointerException if taskNames is null. When it throws an exception, it is caught and a message is displayed to the user, and then returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the file is not empty, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • DialogUtils.showMessageDialog(String, String)
      • TaskNamesService.saveTaskNames()

    • loadTaskNames

      public boolean loadTaskNames()
      Loads data from the file and assigns it to taskNames. If file is empty or doesn't exist, it returns false. When it throws an exception, it is caught and a message is displayed to the user, and returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the taskNames isn't empty, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • Main
      • RepositoryConfigurator
      • DialogUtils.showMessageDialog(String, String)
